column4: anyone have faced that issue before? I have an IBM thinkpad T22 with a pcmcia wifi card and my network connection is really slow.... 2kbps
what chipset does your wifi card have?
see if you can find out the chipset from the output of 'lspci' in a terminal
Network controller: Intersil Corporation ISL3890 [Prism GT/Prism Duette]/ISL3886 [Prism Javelin/Prism Xbow] (rev 01)
